Industry Ventures.description: Developed a site for a client using Ruby on Rails with minimal prior knowledge thereof. Added CMS-like features and created a relatively complex schema for a 'seemingly' static site. Established infrastructure using Heroku/Phusion/PG/Nginx for speed, reliabilty and ease of use.

Men's Wearhouse Mobile Site [moovweb].description: Created a mobile website for The Men's wearhouse using the Moovweb platform to leverage existing HTML and some javascript. Wrote a lot of Javascript and CSS to make it look and function properly on mobile.

professionalExperience.title: Mobile Development Lead
professionalExperience.description: Lead an elite squad of four mobile web developers, a project manager and a QA engineer to project nirvana. Concurrently developed three websites while managing live site releases for over 20 clients. Onboarded new minions and lead the hiring process for multiple technical and non-technical roles.

professionalExperience.title: Mobile Web Developer
professionalExperience.description: Took ownership of a large scale project and subsequently developed the iPad specific website for George division of the Asda co., based out of the UK. Worked as part of a team to maintain current site implementations all whilst simultaneously managing relations with project managers, clients, UX designers and QA teams across three continents.

professionalExperience.title: Support Engineer
professionalExperience.description: Started off fixing tickets and coordinating releases for customer mobile websites. Eventually, ended up developing entire releases, and taking ownership of the enterprise customer onboarding process for our cloud-based platform.

professionalExperience.title: IT Support / Junior programmer
professionalExperience.description: Developed business reporting applications using C# and .NET for demand planning. Wrote a lot of custom SQL reports and ensured data was synchronized properly across a cluster of oracle and microsoft databases.
